channel.title: Sunagakure Village is looking for Monster Hunters
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Sunagakure Village is looking for Monster Hunters" - We have just bought an Enticement Alter and are looking for people to help fight the Kaiju we summon.

item.title: Sunagakure Village is looking for Monster Hunters
item.content:encoded: Also looking for people to help out around the village so we can get upgrades like Epic Monument and Hard Corps.
